price: E deixai o pecado, aparente e latente. Por certo, os que cometem o pecado serão recompensados, pelo que perpetravam.
arabic: وَذَرُواْ ظَٰهِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡسِبُونَ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ سَيُجۡزَوۡنَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَقۡتَرِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wadharū ẓāhira al-ith'mi wabāṭinahu inna alladhīna yaksibūna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bimā kānū yaqtarifūna
